titles.title: American Business Productivity and Quality Enhancement Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain employee productivity awards from gross income.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E604)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/11/1993--Introduced. American Business Productivity and Quality Enhancement Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income certain awards for employee productivity or quality achievement, limited to a specified amount.
